text: Mohamed Khadem Khorasani Azghadi (, 7 September 1935 â€“ 24 November 2020) was an Iranian featherweight freestyle wrestler. He won a silver medal at the 1962 World Championships. He placed eighth at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born in Mashhad, Iran. Khadem died on 24 November 2020 in Tehran, aged 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Iran Category:Iranian wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Mashhad
title: Mohammad Khadem
